title: Edgy
shortDescription: Never go down again, plus maintenance mode, alerts, and more
longDescription:
**What's your strategy for handling scheduled maintenance and downtime? Does it involve maintaining code or deploying bespoke builds? Let Edgy handle your maintenance infrastructure and find something better to do with your development time.**

Why use Edgy?
* For unscheduled downtime, enable *Never Go Down* to stay online for your visitors and receive alerts.
* For scheduled downtime, toggle *on-demand maintenance mode* with one click. 

[Check out Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page).

Edgy keeps your site online when your servers go down and delivers on-demand maintenance mode with one click.  Simply customize the default page or bring your own HTML template.

Edgy Features:
* Never Go Down to keep your site online when your servers are unresponsive.
* Email and webhook alerts when your servers are unresponsive.
* Configurable, built-in maintenance pages or bring your own template with *one click* maintenance mode.
* Only want to take one part of your site down? Use route-based maintenance mode.
* Manage authorized access to bypass maintenance mode with IP Whitelists and override query parameters.

Check out [Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page) or 
read the [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/edgy.html?ref=app-page) for more information.
author: Network Chimp

categories.title: Performance
categories.description: Improve the speed or perceived responsiveness of your website.

proposedApp.title: Edgy
proposedApp.shortDescription: Put your site in Maintenance Mode with one click
proposedApp.longDescription:
**Need to take your site down for maintenance? Enable Maintenance Mode on your website with Edgy.**

Do you need a Maintenance Page?  Install Edgy for *free*.

Already have a Maintenance Page?  Move it to Edgy to enjoy the fastest load times on the Internet thanks to Cloudflare's global network.  

Edgy Features:
* Configurable, built-in maintenance page for *free*.
* Toggle between Maintenance Mode and Bypass Mode with *one click*.
* Use your own template. [*Soon*]
* Only need to take one part of your site down? Enable Maintenance Mode on specific sections of your site. [*Soon*]

Read Edgy's [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/edgy.html) for complete information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

gettingStarted2.helpvalue: ü•öThe Custom Template is rendered for a blank Route Template. The Default Page is rendered if Custom Template is blank.

gettingStarted21.helpvalue: ü•öThe Default Page will be used if you do not supply a Custom Template.

gettingStarted22.helpvalue: ü•öThe Default Page will be replaced by your Custom Template.

gettingStarted23.helpvalue: ü•öAny images and other media in your Custom Template must be base-64 encoded or hosted remotely.

gettingStarted24.helpvalue: ü•öThe üîå by Edgy attribution on the Default Page is hidden in Plus and Pro.

gettingStarted3.helpvalue: ü•öRoute URLs must include a hostname to resolve correctly.

versions.releaseNotes: New Pro Features: Bypass Codes and Scheduled Maintenance

proposedApp.title: Edgy
proposedApp.shortDescription: Free, on-demand Maintenance Mode for your site
proposedApp.longDescription:
**What's your strategy for handling planned (or unplanned) maintenance? Does it involve maintaining code or deploying bespoke builds? Let Edgy handle your maintenance infrastructure and find something better to do with your time.**

Don't get stuck with your site down.  Edgy gives you an on-demand maintenance page with one click.  Simply customize the default page or bring your own HTML template.

Edgy Features:
* Configurable, built-in maintenance page for *free*.
* Toggle between Maintenance Mode and Bypass Mode with *one click*.
* Use your own template.
* Scheduled maintence mode.
* Only need to take one part of your site down? Deploy route-based maintenance mode.
* Respond with any status code.
* Manage authorized access to bypass maintenance mode

Check out Edgy in action [here](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html).
Read Edgy's [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/edgy.html) for more information.

proposedApp.title: Edgy
proposedApp.shortDescription: Free, on-demand Maintenance Mode for your site
proposedApp.longDescription:
**What's your strategy for handling planned (or unplanned) maintenance? Does it involve maintaining code or deploying bespoke builds? Let Edgy handle your maintenance infrastructure and find something better to do with your time.**

Don't get stuck with your site down.  Edgy gives you an on-demand maintenance page with one click.  Simply customize the default page or bring your own HTML template.

Edgy Features:
* Configurable, built-in maintenance page for *free*.
* Toggle between Maintenance Mode and Bypass Mode with *one click*.
* Use your own template.
* Scheduled maintence mode.
* Only need to take one part of your site down? Deploy route-based maintenance mode.
* Respond with any status code.
* Manage authorized access to bypass maintenance mode

Check out Edgy in action [here](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html).
Read Edgy's [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/edgy.html) for more information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

gettingStarted2.helpvalue: üìåThe Custom Template is rendered for a blank Route Template. The Default Page is rendered if Custom Template is blank.

gettingStarted33.helpvalue: ü•öAny images and other media in your Custom Template must be hosted remotely.

gettingStarted60.helpvalue: üìå IP Whitelist and Bypass Code lets the people you want to bypass maintenance mode.

gettingStarted65.helpvalue: üìå Scheduled Maintenance automatically enables maintenance mode after the instant you choose. The instant must formatted as a ISO 8601 date.

gettingStarted90.helpvalue: üìåRoute URLs must include a hostname to resolve correctly.

proposedApp.title: Edgy
proposedApp.shortDescription: Free, on-demand Maintenance Mode for your site
proposedApp.longDescription:
**What's your strategy for handling planned (or unplanned) maintenance? Does it involve maintaining code or deploying bespoke builds? Let Edgy handle your maintenance infrastructure and find something better to do with your time.**

Don't get stuck with your site down.  Edgy gives you an on-demand maintenance page with one click.  Simply customize the default page or bring your own HTML template.

Edgy Features:
* Configurable, built-in maintenance page for *free*.
* Toggle between Maintenance Mode and Bypass Mode with *one click*.
* Use your own template.
* Scheduled maintence mode.
* Only need to take one part of your site down? Deploy route-based maintenance mode.
* Respond with any status code.
* Manage authorized access to bypass maintenance mode

Check out Edgy in action [here](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html).
Read Edgy's [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/edgy.html) for more information.

proposedApp.shortDescription: Free, on-demand Maintenance Mode for your site
proposedApp.longDescription:
**What's your strategy for handling planned (or unplanned) maintenance? Does it involve maintaining code or deploying bespoke builds? Let Edgy handle your maintenance infrastructure and find something better to do with your time.**

Don't get stuck with your site down.  Edgy gives you an on-demand maintenance page with one click.  Simply customize the default page or bring your own HTML template.

Edgy Features:
* Configurable, built-in maintenance page for *free*.
* Toggle between Maintenance Mode and Bypass Mode with *one click*.
* Use your own template.
* Scheduled maintence mode.
* Only need to take one part of your site down? Deploy route-based maintenance mode.
* Respond with any status code.
* Manage authorized access to bypass maintenance mode

Check out Edgy in action [here](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html).
Read Edgy's [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/edgy.html) for more information.

  • Bring your own templates or just use our built-in page.

proposedApp.title: Edgy
proposedApp.shortDescription: Instant, on-demand Maintenance Mode for your site
proposedApp.longDescription:
**What's your strategy for handling planned (or unplanned) maintenance? Does it involve maintaining code or deploying bespoke builds? Let Edgy handle your maintenance infrastructure and find something better to do with your development time.**

[Check out Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page).

Edgy gives you on-demand maintenance mode with one click.  Simply customize the default page or bring your own HTML template.

Edgy Features:
* Configurable, built-in maintenance page.
* Toggle Maintenance Mode with *one click* or scheduled maintenance.
* Bring your own maintenance template.
* Only want to take one part of your site down? Use route-based maintenance mode.
* Manage authorized access to bypass maintenance mode with IP Whitelists and override query parameters.

Check out [Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page) or 
read the [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/edgy.html?ref=app-page) for more information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

proposedApp.title: Edgy
proposedApp.shortDescription: On-demand Maintenance Mode and always stay online
proposedApp.longDescription:
**What's your strategy for handling planned (or unplanned) maintenance? Does it involve maintaining code or deploying bespoke builds? Let Edgy handle your maintenance infrastructure and find something better to do with your development time.**

[Check out Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page).

Edgy gives you on-demand maintenance mode with one click.  Simply customize the default page or bring your own HTML template.

Edgy Features:
* Configurable, built-in maintenance page.
* Toggle Maintenance Mode with *one click* or scheduled maintenance.
* Bring your own maintenance template.
* Only want to take one part of your site down? Use route-based maintenance mode.
* Manage authorized access to bypass maintenance mode with IP Whitelists and override query parameters.

Check out [Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page) or 
read the [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/edgy.html?ref=app-page) for more information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

proposedApp.title: Edgy
proposedApp.shortDescription: Always stay online with on-demand maintenance mode and more
proposedApp.longDescription:
**What's your strategy for handling planned (or unplanned) maintenance? Does it involve maintaining code or deploying bespoke builds? Let Edgy handle your maintenance infrastructure and find something better to do with your development time.**

[Check out Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page).

Edgy gives you on-demand maintenance mode with one click.  Simply customize the default page or bring your own HTML template.

Edgy Features:
* Configurable, built-in maintenance page.
* Toggle Maintenance Mode with *one click* or scheduled maintenance.
* Bring your own maintenance template.
* Only want to take one part of your site down? Use route-based maintenance mode.
* Manage authorized access to bypass maintenance mode with IP Whitelists and override query parameters.

Check out [Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page) or 
read the [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/edgy.html?ref=app-page) for more information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

proposedApp.title: Edgy
proposedApp.shortDescription: Always stay online with on-demand maintenance mode and more
proposedApp.longDescription:
**What's your strategy for handling planned (or unplanned) maintenance? Does it involve maintaining code or deploying bespoke builds? Let Edgy handle your maintenance infrastructure and find something better to do with your development time.**

[Check out Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page).

Edgy gives you on-demand maintenance mode with one click.  Simply customize the default page or bring your own HTML template.

Edgy Features:
* Configurable, built-in maintenance page.
* Toggle Maintenance Mode with *one click* or scheduled maintenance.
* Bring your own maintenance template.
* Only want to take one part of your site down? Use route-based maintenance mode.
* Manage authorized access to bypass maintenance mode with IP Whitelists and override query parameters.

Check out [Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page) or 
read the [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/edgy.html?ref=app-page) for more information.

proposedApp.title: Edgy
proposedApp.shortDescription: Always stay online with on-demand maintenance mode and more
proposedApp.longDescription:
**What's your strategy for handling planned (or unplanned) maintenance? Does it involve maintaining code or deploying bespoke builds? Let Edgy handle your maintenance infrastructure and find something better to do with your development time.**

[Check out Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page).

Edgy gives you on-demand maintenance mode with one click.  Simply customize the default page or bring your own HTML template.

Edgy Features:
* Configurable, built-in maintenance page.
* Toggle Maintenance Mode with *one click* or scheduled maintenance.
* Bring your own maintenance template.
* Only want to take one part of your site down? Use route-based maintenance mode.
* Manage authorized access to bypass maintenance mode with IP Whitelists and override query parameters.

Check out [Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page) or 
read the [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/edgy.html?ref=app-page) for more information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

proposedApp.title: Edgy
proposedApp.shortDescription: Never go down again with maintenance mode, alerts, and more
proposedApp.longDescription:
**What's your strategy for handling scheduled maintenance and downtime? Does it involve maintaining code or deploying bespoke builds? Let Edgy handle your maintenance infrastructure and find something better to do with your development time.**

Why use Edgy?
* For unscheduled downtime, enable *Never Go Down* to stay online for your visitors and receive alerts.
* For scheduled downtime, toggle *on-demand maintenance mode* with one click. 

[Check out Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page).

Edgy keeps your site online when your servers go down and delivers on-demand maintenance mode with one click.  Simply customize the default page or bring your own HTML template.

Edgy Features:
* Never Go Down to keep your site online when your servers are unresponsive.
* Email and webhook alerts when your servers are unresponsive.
* Configurable, built-in maintenance pages or bring your own template with *one click* maintenance mode.
* Only want to take one part of your site down? Use route-based maintenance mode.
* Manage authorized access to bypass maintenance mode with IP Whitelists and override query parameters.

Check out [Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page) or 
read the [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/edgy.html?ref=app-page) for more information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp

torrent.yoursite.com ‚ü∂ 172.132.921:8787 [Port Proxy] 
 yoursite.com/api ‚ü∂ your-api.now.sh [Location Proxy] 
 yoursite.com/docs ‚ü∂ docs.yoursite.com [301 Redirect]

Seamlessly proxy requests from any subdomain or path to other parts of your domain.

proposedApp.title: Edgy
proposedApp.shortDescription: Never go down again with maintenance mode, alerts, and more
proposedApp.longDescription:
**What's your strategy for handling scheduled maintenance and downtime? Does it involve maintaining code or deploying bespoke builds? Let Edgy handle your maintenance infrastructure and find something better to do with your development time.**

Why use Edgy?
* For unscheduled downtime, enable *Never Go Down* to stay online for your visitors and receive alerts.
* For scheduled downtime, toggle *on-demand maintenance mode* with one click. 

[Check out Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page).

Edgy keeps your site online when your servers go down and delivers on-demand maintenance mode with one click.  Simply customize the default page or bring your own HTML template.

Edgy Features:
* Never Go Down to keep your site online when your servers are unresponsive.
* Email and webhook alerts when your servers are unresponsive.
* Configurable, built-in maintenance pages or bring your own template with *one click* maintenance mode.
* Only want to take one part of your site down? Use route-based maintenance mode.
* Manage authorized access to bypass maintenance mode with IP Whitelists and override query parameters.

Check out [Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page) or 
read the [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/edgy.html?ref=app-page) for more information.

* Never Go Down to keep your site online when your servers are unresponsive.
* Email and webhook alerts when your servers are unresponsive.
* Configurable, built-in maintenance pages or bring your own template with *one click* maintenance mode.
* Only want to take one part of your site down? Use route-based maintenance mode.
* Manage authorized access to bypass maintenance mode with IP Whitelists and override query parameters.

Check out [Edgy in action](https://www.networkchimp.com/tutorials/edgy.html?ref=app-page) or 
read the [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/edgy.html?ref=app-page) for more information.
